Package com.vectorprint.report.itext.annotations

Annotations for classes to indicate how these should be translated into iText elements.

See: Description

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CONTAINER_ELEMENT
    A choice of possible container elements, elements that can hold others.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ContainerEnd
    This annotation indicates a container is to be ended.
    Containers
    You can annotate classes in your data to trigger the start of one or more containers.
    ContainerStart
    You can annotate classes in your data to trigger the start of a container.
    DataType
    Use this in containers and elements to indicate a certain datatype
    Element
    You can annotate classes in your data to be added to a report as implementations of Element and styled according to styleClasses.
    Elements
    You can annotate classes in your data to trigger the start of one or more elements.
    GetData
    Use this in containers and elements to indicate the method that will yield data to be added to the report.
    MultipleFromData
    You can annotate classes in your data to trigger the start of one or more similar elements based on a collection of data.

Package com.vectorprint.report.itext.annotations Description

Annotations for classes to indicate how these should be translated into iText elements. Add instances of your annotated classes to a ReportDataHolder using your extention of DataCollectorImpl.
